name: Eligible
headline: Insurance Billing APIs for Healthcare Businesses
description: Eligible is the nation's first insurance billing platform built for builders. Founded in Mountain View California in 2011, Eligible's platform gives bootstrapping healthcare startups the scale of enterprise, and the Fortune 500s the agility of the hungry entrepreneur.  Eligible has been listed as one of Business Insider’s 19 Hottest Startups to Watch and Katelyn has been featured in Forbes 30 Under 30 in Healthcare, Fast Company's Most Creative People in Business, and was named a Rising Star of Healthcare by Becker’s IT & CIO Review.
markdown:

![Pic hero home](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-hero-home-c9207bad3a4b9099aae34bf1885673c6.digested.svg)
## Connect.Automate.Revolutionize.
Eligible APIs enable the integration of insurance billing experiences into healthcare applications.
Trusted by healthcare companies big and small
![Radnet](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-radnet-201884d1876bb5a6b7fbb55ac986e038.digested.png)
![BlueShield](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-blue-shield-ca-logo-8d4cb72b6cf1af710abe101ad673d354.digested.png)
![Quest Diagnostics](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-circle-medical-5aaf06120515b64f8245efddc15b4f69.digested.png)
![Kareo](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-kareo-logo-5923ca59fd03dc3902b89f29976d4708.digested.png)
![Omada](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-omada-159934a58d847c3e5c432473e18db23e.digested.png)
### Revolutionize Revenue Cycle
Create an automation masterpiece once, and watch it thrive for years to come. Our API-first approach gives you the power to automate insurance billing experiences with remarkable scale, precision, and efficiency.
### Innovate at Startup Speed
Blend startup agility with enterprise strength. Build, launch, learn, and rapidly improve solutions with the creativity of a startup's day-one mentality - while benefiting from enterprise-grade support.
### Unify Healthcare Billing Data
Eligible remains one of the few nationwide direct-connection-first options for essential healthcare transactions. Providing you with the ability to break down archaic silos of information and streamline processes.
### One Vision, One Goal
One team. One vision. One goal: Seamlessly connect healthcare billing data across every provider system, from frontend patient clearance to backend revenue cycle management, and achieve unparalleled results.
## THINK DIFFERENT ABOUT HEALTHCARE FINANCIAL WORKFLOWS
### In-App Insurance Billing Experiences
Deliver exceptional experiences for insurance billing to your end users. Run estimations, perform insurance verifications and file patient's claims all with simple APIs.
[Get started arrow_forward](https://eligible.com/</signup>)
![Computer Image](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-computer-d30dc6ad53625aa25ecf016e7afcf3a9.digested.png)
### Insurance Verifications
Process and verify insurance to confirm policy status, healthcare eligibility, and more.
### Insurance Claims
File in and out of network health insurance claims for healthcare providers or on behalf of patients. Track the clearinghouse and revenue cycle status till fully settled.
### Events
Easily track the status of insurance billing submissions via apis and webhooks. From creation to payment reports automate the tracking experience end to end.
![Pic innovation](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-innovation-bcee244281ac50ab0ffed79ec750e781.digested.svg)
## REDEFINING PROCESSES WITH INTELLIGENT INFRASTRUCTURE
### Advanced Automations.
Seamlessly integrate key financial workflows like managing insurance submissions, payment status, eligibility, and line-item patient out-of-pocket cost transparency. Elevate organizational efficiency and bring unprecedented visibility to healthcare provider financial operations.
[Get started arrow_forward](https://eligible.com/</signup>)
![Eligible Support](https://eligible.com/assets/pic-privacy-locker-148c0cedb99edef3a4f67fc5cce026b5.digested.png)
## Eligible support
Whether you are new to Eligible, or continuing to increase your adoption of services as you develop applications and build business solutions, we want to provide the right resources to support your success.
### Basic Support
Eligible offers two types of support plans basic and enterprise. The Basic plan is free of charge and offers support for account and billing questions.
### Enterprise support upgrade available
Technical support from high-quality engineers, consultative architectural guidance delivered in the context of your applications and use-cases.
### Features
  * [Insurance Claims](https://eligible.com/</docs/insurance-billing/integration-quickstart>)
  * [Insurance Verifications](https://eligible.com/</docs/patient-clearance/insurance-verifications>)
  * [Eligibility & Benefits](https://eligible.com/</docs/patient-clearance/insurance-verifications>)
  * [Insurance Enrollments](https://eligible.com/</dashboard/enrollment_npis>)
  * [ML Powered Estimations](https://eligible.com/</docs/patient-insurance/cost-estimates#machine-learning-powered-for-increased-accuracy>)
  * [Reporting](https://eligible.com/</ds_reports_v2/patient_collection_performance>)
  * [Enterprise Data Transfers](https://eligible.com/</predict_ai/ingestion_configurations>)


### Product Lines
  * [Insurance Billing](https://eligible.com/</docs/insurance-billing/overview>)
  * [Patient Clearance](https://eligible.com/</docs/patient-clearance/overview>)


### Account
  * [Manage](https://eligible.com/</profile/information>)
  * [Sign In](https://eligible.com/</users/sign_in>)


### Support Plans
  * [Basic Support](https://eligible.com/</docs/support-plans/eligible-support-plans#basic-support-plan-and-pricing>)
  * [Enterprise Support](https://eligible.com/</docs/support-plans/eligible-support-plans#enterprise-support-plan-and-pricing>)
  * [System Status](https://eligible.com/<https:/status.eligible.com/>)


### For Developers
  * [Webhooks](https://eligible.com/</docs/webhooks>)
  * [API Monitoring](https://eligible.com/</dashboard>)
  * [Documentation](https://eligible.com/</docs/api>)
  * [Claims.js](https://eligible.com/</docs/insurance-billing/claims-js>)


### Staff Facing Features
  * [Insurance Enrollments](https://eligible.com/</dashboard/enrollment_npis>)
  * [Enterprise Data Transfers](https://eligible.com/</predict_ai/ingestion_configurations>)
  * [Reporting](https://eligible.com/</ds_reports_v2/patient_collection_performance>)
  * [Estimation Accuracy Reporting](https://eligible.com/</ds_reports_v2/predict_reports/production_accuracy>)


More ways to contact us: [Start a chat](https://eligible.com/<#>) or Email us support@eligible.com. Or call 1-888-909-3055
Copyright © 2025 Eligible Inc. All rights reserved.
  * [Privacy Policy](https://eligible.com/</privacy>)
  * [Terms of Use](https://eligible.com/</terms>)
  * [Pricing](https://eligible.com/</pricing>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Eligible**

Founded in 2011, Eligible is a pioneering technology company based in New York that has established itself as a leader in the healthcare billing space. It was birthed out of the necessity for a streamlined insurance billing process and has the distinction of being the nation's first insurance billing platform specifically tailored for builders. Originally hailing from Mountain View, California, Eligible made headlines as it emerged from Y Combinator’s S12 batch, promoting innovation in healthcare. 

**Mission and Vision**

Eligible aims to deliver **Insurance Billing APIs** to healthcare businesses, empowering both startups and established enterprises to efficiently navigate the often cumbersome world of healthcare billing. Their mission is straightforward: help providers connect, automate, and revolutionize their insurance billing processes while retaining the agility and creativity of a startup.

**Key Achievements**

Eligible has garnered recognition as one of Business Insider’s "19 Hottest Startups to Watch." Its founder, Katelyn, has made multiple influential lists, including Forbes’ 30 Under 30 in Healthcare, highlighting the company’s impact and potential in the healthcare sector. 

**Products and Services**

The Eligible platform boasts a robust range of products designed to streamline insurance billing and patient clearance:
- **Insurance Billing:** Automates the submission of claims to payers, tracks their status, and simplifies revenue cycle management. 
- **Patient Clearance:** Processes eligibility checks and insurance verifications to enhance patient experiences.

Eligible’s API-first approach allows healthcare developers to effortlessly integrate billing experiences into their applications, providing solutions ranging from insurance verifications to filing claims.

**Support and Accessibility**

Eligible offers two types of support plans: a free Basic plan for general account inquiries and an Enterprise support package which includes more specialized technical assistance. This tiered support system ensures that both fledgling startups and larger health organizations receive the help they need as they scale their operations.

**In Summary**

Eligible represents a fresh perspective on how healthcare billing processes should function. By leveraging technology and fostering a client-centric approach, it aims to remove barriers and create an efficient, transparent billing environment. Through their commitment to innovation and excellence, Eligible is not just another tech startup; it’s a critical player reshaping the healthcare landscape for the better. 

For more information, visit their [website](https://eligible.com).
